title: Catatan App
description: Simple note application created using MERN stack. You can sign up an account, create notes, and manage them.

title: Pokedex Tokopedia
description: A mini project as part of Tokopedia's recruitment flow. Created using Tokopedia's current techstack such as Apollo Client and Emotion.

title: Pekepollo
description: Design overhaul of previous project (Tokopedia). The UI was rebuild using Material-UI and hell that was a great choice. Please visit the app.
